headline: Trump Warns Netflix-Warner Deal May Pose Antitrust ‘Problem’
summary: The company faces a lengthy Justice Department review of a deal that would reshape the entertainment industry.  “Well, that’s got to go through a process, and we’ll see what happens,” Trump said Sunday when asked about the deal, confirming he met Netflix co-Chief Executive Officer Ted Sarandos recently.

headline: Research Veteran Yardeni Ends 15-Year Tech Bet With Underweight Mag 7 Call
summary: “We see more competitors coming for the juicy profit margins of the Magnificent 7,” and expect that the productivity and profit margins of the rest of the S&P 500 will be boosted by tech, said Wall Street research veteran Ed Yardeni.  The Magnificent 7 stocks were mixed in premarket trading on Monday, with Tesla Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Nvidia Corp. underperforming peers.  The Magnificent 7 merits special caution as “they’re competing more aggressively against each other and they’ve got more competition coming out of nowhere” Yardeni said in an interview with Bloomberg Television on Monday.

content.title: Research Veteran Yardeni Ends 15-Year Tech Bet With Underweight Mag 7 Call
content.summary: “We see more competitors coming for the juicy profit margins of the Magnificent 7,” and expect that the productivity and profit margins of the rest of the S&P 500 will be boosted by tech, said Wall Street research veteran Ed Yardeni.  The Magnificent 7 stocks were mixed in premarket trading on Monday, with Tesla Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Nvidia Corp. underperforming peers.  The Magnificent 7 merits special caution as “they’re competing more aggressively against each other and they’ve got more competition coming out of nowhere” Yardeni said in an interview with Bloomberg Television on Monday.

headline: Does Dividend Stability And Patent Wins Reframe InterDigital’s Licensing Story For Investors (IDCC)?
summary: InterDigital, Inc. has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of US$0.70 per share on its common stock, payable on or about January 28, 2026 to shareholders of record as of January 14, 2026, an action the company announced previously and which remains in place today. Alongside this dividend continuity, recent favorable patent rulings against Disney and fresh infringement actions targeting Amazon highlight how InterDigital aims to further monetize its video and streaming technology...

headline: X-energy Appoints Daniel Gross as Chief Financial Officer
summary: ROCKVILLE, Md., December 08, 2025--X-energy Reactor Company, LLC, a leading developer of advanced small modular nuclear reactors and fuel technology, today announced the appointment of Daniel Gross as Chief Financial Officer. headline: InterDigital (IDCC): Reassessing Valuation After Patent Wins Over Disney and New Litigation Against Amazon
summary: InterDigital (IDCC) has suddenly moved higher on the market radar after winning key patent cases against Disney in Germany and Brazil, while also opening a fresh wave of infringement litigation against Amazon. See our latest analysis for InterDigital. Those courtroom wins seem to be reinforcing an already strong run. The latest share price is $355.18, with an 81.14% year-to-date share price return on top of an 85.90% one-year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is still very much...

headline: The Accounting Uproar Over How Fast an AI Chip Depreciates
summary: A debate is raging over the accounting treatment of  Nvidia  chips and other equipment that tech companies are splurging on.  Rarely have investors obsessed over a topic as seemingly banal as the proper depreciation schedule for fixed assets.  “Extending useful life decreases depreciation expense and increases apparent profits,” he wrote in an article last month.

content.title: The Accounting Uproar Over How Fast an AI Chip Depreciates
content.summary: A debate is raging over the accounting treatment of  Nvidia  chips and other equipment that tech companies are splurging on.  Rarely have investors obsessed over a topic as seemingly banal as the proper depreciation schedule for fixed assets.  “Extending useful life decreases depreciation expense and increases apparent profits,” he wrote in an article last month.
